name: getAvatarImageByType
description:
Returns the default project or issue type avatar image.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** None.

type.description: The icon type of the avatar.

size.description: The size of the avatar image. If not provided the default size is returned.

format.description: The format to return the avatar image in. If not provided the original content format is returned.
